text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the Intel Core i7. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Eluktronics P640RE Premium Gaming Laptop PC - Intel Core i7-6700HQ Quad Core Windows 10 Home 3GB 970M GTX GDDR5 14.0” Full HD IPS Anti-Glare Display 128GB Eluktro Pro Performance SSD 32GB DDR4 RAM!
